nodes.text: This raid took place in 44 ABY in the Galactic Alliance's Detention Center 81, a prison where Valin and Jysella Horn were being held in carbonite by Chief of State Natasi Daala. The raid was led by Han, Leia, and Jaina Solo, as well as Zekk and Taryn Zel. After fighting several guards, the Jedi and their allies were able to free the Horn siblings from carbonite.
